Text: Thanks LegendET, works well apart from a bit of an audio glitch on some cut scenes, but I don't care about that. Info is wrong though, it says 2 gig hard drive required, but this unpacks to 2.93gig, just FYI, all in all, nice torrent, +1 from me, Cheers.

Using Win7 64bit there is no speech. Have to use the subtitles. 
Maybe I try the WinXP-Mode.

Nice Game anyway.
THX
